Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 10.8 with a standard deviation 2.7. The z-score of the person with 10 right is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -0.81
* -0.3
* 0.91

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.81: Incorrect
-0.3: Correct
* 0.91: Incorrect
